name: Where To Next
description:
Where To Next is a text-based narrative game made using Articy: Draft 3 and Unity as an assignment for a year 1 narrative design course.
This was mostly a learning experience for me in both writing as well as adapting to a new workflow in Articy: Draft. Regardless, I hope you enjoy playing it. 

I'm looking for feedback to potentially improve this project in the future. Comments are much appreciated!

Upcoming Changes: Improving/adding branches to make it easier for players to access certain endings.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDINGS
**The following contains spoilers for how to achieve each ending**
If you have difficulty reaching certain endings I recommend using Chapter Select on the main screen and setting regrets to cleared.

Ending #1 - No More Chances
'Fail' in the argument at the elementary school. 

Ending #2 - Separate Ways
Reach the end of the game with no/some regrets cleared.

Ending 3 - Where To Next
Reach the end of the game with all regrets cleared.
